title: Independence War Deluxe Edition
notes: I flew around on instant action and first tutorial mission and game runs stable and smooth, no noticeable issues found.

title: Independence War: Defiance
notes: Additional campaign on Independence War Deluxe Edition is not working. After clicking on "Play", pop-up window will declare: Error: Failed attempt to launch program or document. Action: <\Defiance\Intro.exe> Params:<> Specifically: Path not found. Line# --> 002: RunWait,%InstallDir%\Defiance\Intro.exe. The current thread will exit.
